gobblin.util

Class ProxiedFileSystemUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.util.ProxiedFileSystemUtils

  • public class ProxiedFileSystemUtils
extends Object
    Utility class for creating FileSystem objects while proxied as another user. This class requires access to a user with secure impersonation priveleges. The FileSystem objects returned will have full permissions to access any operations on behalf of the specified user.

    As a user, use methods in ProxiedFileSystemCache to generate the proxied file systems.

    See Also:
    Secure Impersonation, UserGroupInformation TODO figure out the proper generic type for the {@link Token} objects.

        public static boolean canProxyAs(String userNameToProxyAs,

      • getTokenFromSeqFile

        public static Optional<org.apache.hadoop.security.token.Token<?>> getTokenFromSeqFile(String userNameKey,
                                                                                      Path tokenFilePath)
                                                                               throws IOException
        Retrives a Token from a given sequence file for a specified user. The sequence file should contain a list of key, value pairs where each key corresponds to a user and each value corresponds to a Token for that user.
        Parameters:
        userNameKey - The name of the user to retrieve a Token for
        tokenFilePath - The path to the sequence file containing the Tokens
        Returns:
        A Token for the given user name
        Throws:
        IOException
